content: >this pattern is available for downloading also on payhip 1 with a pay what you want option the karjalan neito sock pattern is a part of the series of my karelia inspired knitting patterns it was my christmas / holiday season 2021 gift for the knitters **pattern features ** - knitted cuff down - instructions written in metric and us terminology - instructions written for magic loop but dpns can be used as well - three sizes small 60 sts medium 66 sts and large 72 sts - instructions for working lateral a k a vikkel braids - strong heel structure - charts but no written instructions for stranded colourwork and textured ribbing patterns - proof read by helena kahan 1 https //payhip com/b/lqbks
